/* PayslipMapper.CountPayslip */
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SA_PAYSLIP P WHERE P.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND P.WORK_HISTORY_ID = ?WorkHistoryId
AND P.PAYSLIP_ID != ?PayslipId
AND SUBSTRING(P.PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD, 1, 6) = SUBSTRING(REPLACE(?PayslipPaymentYmd, '-', ''), 1, 6)

/* PayslipMapper.ListPayslip */
WITH SALARY_AMOUNT_BASE AS ( SELECT P.PAYSLIP_ID, PD.SALARY_TYPE_CODE, SUM(PD.SALARY_AMOUNT) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM SA_PAYSLIP P LEFT JOIN SA_PAYSLIP_SALARY_DETAIL PD ON PD.PAYSLIP_ID = P.PAYSLIP_ID WHERE P.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND PD.SALARY_AMOUNT IS NOT NULL GROUP BY P.PAYSLIP_ID, PD.SALARY_TYPE_CODE ) SELECT P.PAYSLIP_ID, P.EMPLOYEE_ID, P.WORK_HISTORY_ID, P.PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD, CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(P.PAYSLIP_NOTE) > 100 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(P.PAYSLIP_NOTE, 1, 100), '...') ELSE P.PAYSLIP_NOTE END AS PAYSLIP_NOTE, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(A00.TOTAL_AMOUNT), 0), 0) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_A00, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(B00.TOTAL_AMOUNT), 0), 0) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_B00, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(A00.TOTAL_AMOUNT), 0) - IFNULL(SUM(B00.TOTAL_AMOUNT), 0), 0) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM SA_PAYSLIP P LEFT JOIN SALARY_AMOUNT_BASE A00 ON A00.PAYSLIP_ID = P.PAYSLIP_ID AND A00.SALARY_TYPE_CODE = 'A00' LEFT JOIN SALARY_AMOUNT_BASE B00 ON B00.PAYSLIP_ID = P.PAYSLIP_ID AND B00.SALARY_TYPE_CODE = 'B00' WHERE P.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND P.WORK_HISTORY_ID = ?WorkHistoryId
AND P.EMPLOYEE_ID = ?EmployeeId
AND DATE_FORMAT(P.PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD, '%Y') = ?PayslipPaymentYYYY
AND DATE_FORMAT(P.PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD, '%m') = ?PayslipPaymentMM
GROUP BY P.PAYSLIP_ID ORDER BY P.EMPLOYEE_ID DESC, P.PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD DESC
LIMIT 1

/* PayslipMapper.ListPrevNextPayslip */
SELECT P1.PAYSLIP_ID, P1.PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD, P1.PREV_NEXT_FLAG FROM SA_PAYSLIP P INNER JOIN ( (SELECT PAYSLIP_ID, PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD, 'PREV' AS PREV_NEXT_FLAG FROM SA_PAYSLIP WHERE PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD < REPLACE(?PayslipPaymentYmd, '-', '') AND WORK_HISTORY_ID = ?WorkHistoryId AND DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY EMPLOYEE_ID DESC, PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD DESC LIMIT 1)
UNION ALL
(SELECT PAYSLIP_ID, PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD, 'NEXT' AS PREV_NEXT_FLAG FROM SA_PAYSLIP WHERE PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD > REPLACE(?PayslipPaymentYmd, '-', '') AND WORK_HISTORY_ID = ?WorkHistoryId AND DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY EMPLOYEE_ID, PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD LIMIT 1) ) P1 ON P1.PAYSLIP_ID = P.PAYSLIP_ID

/* PayslipMapper.GetPayslip */
WITH PREV_SALARY_AMOUNT_BASE AS ( SELECT ?PayslipId AS PAYSLIP_ID, P.PAYSLIP_ID AS PREV_PAYSLIP_ID, PD.SALARY_TYPE_CODE, SUM(PD.SALARY_AMOUNT) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM SA_PAYSLIP P LEFT JOIN SA_PAYSLIP_SALARY_DETAIL PD ON PD.PAYSLIP_ID = P.PAYSLIP_ID WHERE P.PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD < REPLACE(?PayslipPaymentYmd, '-', '') AND P.WORK_HISTORY_ID = ?WorkHistoryId AND P.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND PD.SALARY_AMOUNT IS NOT NULL GROUP BY 1, 2, 3 ORDER BY P.EMPLOYEE_ID DESC, P.PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD DESC LIMIT 2 ), SALARY_AMOUNT_BASE AS ( SELECT P.PAYSLIP_ID, PD.SALARY_TYPE_CODE, SUM(PD.SALARY_AMOUNT) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM SA_PAYSLIP P LEFT JOIN SA_PAYSLIP_SALARY_DETAIL PD ON PD.PAYSLIP_ID = P.PAYSLIP_ID WHERE P.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND PD.SALARY_AMOUNT IS NOT NULL GROUP BY P.PAYSLIP_ID, PD.SALARY_TYPE_CODE ), COMPANY_BASE AS ( SELECT C.COMPANY_ID, C.COMPANY_NAME, H.EMPLOYEE_ID FROM HM_COMPANY C LEFT JOIN HM_WORK_HISTORY H ON H.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID WHERE C.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND H.DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY H.JOIN_YMD DESC ) SELECT T.*, T.TOTAL_AMOUNT - T.PREV_TOTAL_AMOUNT AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_COMPARE, ((T.TOTAL_AMOUNT - T.PREV_TOTAL_AMOUNT) / T.PREV_TOTAL_AMOUNT) * 100 AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_COMPARE_PERCENT,
IFNULL(T.TOTAL_AMOUNT_A00, 0) - T.PREV_TOTAL_AMOUNT_A00 AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_COMPARE_A00, IFNULL(T.TOTAL_AMOUNT_B00, 0) - T.PREV_TOTAL_AMOUNT_B00 AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_COMPARE_B00,
((IFNULL(T.TOTAL_AMOUNT_A00, 0) - T.PREV_TOTAL_AMOUNT_A00) / T.PREV_TOTAL_AMOUNT_A00) * 100 AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_COMPARE_PERCENT_A00, ((IFNULL(T.TOTAL_AMOUNT_B00, 0) - T.PREV_TOTAL_AMOUNT_B00) / T.PREV_TOTAL_AMOUNT_B00) * 100 AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_COMPARE_PERCENT_B00 FROM (
SELECT P.PAYSLIP_ID, E.USER_ID, P.EMPLOYEE_ID, P.WORK_HISTORY_ID, P.PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD, P.PAYSLIP_NOTE, P.RANK_CODE, CD.CODE_NAME AS RANK_CODE_NAME, H.JOIN_YMD, CB.COMPANY_NAME, IFNULL(SUM(A00.TOTAL_AMOUNT), 0) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_A00, IFNULL(SUM(B00.TOTAL_AMOUNT), 0) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_B00, IFNULL(SUM(A00.TOTAL_AMOUNT), 0) - IFNULL(SUM(B00.TOTAL_AMOUNT), 0) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT, IFNULL(SUM(PREV_A00.TOTAL_AMOUNT), 0) - IFNULL(SUM(PREV_B00.TOTAL_AMOUNT), 0) AS PREV_TOTAL_AMOUNT, PREV_A00.TOTAL_AMOUNT AS PREV_TOTAL_AMOUNT_A00, PREV_B00.TOTAL_AMOUNT AS PREV_TOTAL_AMOUNT_B00 FROM SA_PAYSLIP P LEFT JOIN SALARY_AMOUNT_BASE A00 ON A00.PAYSLIP_ID = P.PAYSLIP_ID AND A00.SALARY_TYPE_CODE = 'A00' LEFT JOIN SALARY_AMOUNT_BASE B00 ON B00.PAYSLIP_ID = P.PAYSLIP_ID AND B00.SALARY_TYPE_CODE = 'B00' LEFT JOIN PREV_SALARY_AMOUNT_BASE PREV_A00 ON PREV_A00.PAYSLIP_ID = P.PAYSLIP_ID AND PREV_A00.SALARY_TYPE_CODE = 'A00' LEFT JOIN PREV_SALARY_AMOUNT_BASE PREV_B00 ON PREV_B00.PAYSLIP_ID = P.PAYSLIP_ID AND PREV_B00.SALARY_TYPE_CODE = 'B00' LEFT JOIN HM_EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMPLOYEE_ID = P.EMPLOYEE_ID LEFT JOIN HM_WORK_HISTORY H ON H.WORK_HISTORY_ID = P.WORK_HISTORY_ID LEFT JOIN COMPANY_BASE CB ON CB.COMPANY_ID = H.COMPANY_ID AND CB.EMPLOYEE_ID = H.EMPLOYEE_ID LEFT JOIN CO_CODE CD ON CD.CODE_VALUE = P.RANK_CODE AND CD.UP_CODE_ID = 'RANK_00' WHERE P.PAYSLIP_ID = ?PayslipId ) T

/* PayslipMapper.AddPayslip */
INSERT INTO SA_PAYSLIP ( EMPLOYEE_ID, WORK_HISTORY_ID, PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD, PAYSLIP_NOTE, RANK_CODE, CREATER_ID ) VALUES ( ?EmployeeId, ?WorkHistoryId, REPLACE(?PayslipPaymentYmd, '-', ''), CASE ?PayslipNote WHEN '' THEN NULL ELSE ?PayslipNote END, ?RankCode, ?CreaterId ) ;SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

/* PayslipMapper.UpdatePayslip */
UPDATE SA_PAYSLIP SET PAYSLIP_PAYMENT_YMD = REPLACE(?PayslipPaymentYmd, '-', ''), PAYSLIP_NOTE = ?PayslipNote, RANK_CODE = ?RankCode, UPDATER_ID = ?UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE PAYSLIP_ID = ?PayslipId

/* PayslipMapper.RemovePayslip */
UPDATE SA_PAYSLIP SET DELETE_YN = 'Y', UPDATER_ID = ?UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE PAYSLIP_ID = ?PayslipId
